description.ko: 정보 시대의 잊혀진 파편들 사이에서 생명이 피어나는 디지털 정원의 영원한 만개입니다.
description.en: The eternal bloom of a digital garden, where life emerges from the forgotten fragments of the information age.

prompt: A majestic digital willow tree with weeping branches made of translucent, binary-coded glass fibers, growing from a valley of discarded microchips and oxidized copper. The leaves are intricate fractal flowers in soft pastel pink and azure that pulse with a gentle light. Nature is reclaiming technology through blooming digital petals and mossy circuitry. 8k, macro photography style, Octane Render. Intricate subsurface scattering on the glass foliage, cinematic lighting, and a soft bokeh background that emphasizes the delicate intersection of organic life and silicon.
